DOC.brief_summary: The main objective is to compare the physiological reactivity (heart and respiratory rates, galvanic skin response, cerebral perfusion, and startle) in the three phases of emotion between depressive subjects, subjects remitted from depression and control subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Comparative Study of Physiological and Cerebrovascular Reactivity in Depression, at the Three Phases of Emotion
